description: In this scene, a man wielding a butterfly net stands in a field of flowers, seemingly attempting to catch small creatures. Above him, however, a large net is suspended, ensnaring several winged humans, presenting a surreal inversion of expected roles. The humans trapped in the net have butterfly wings, highlighting the absurd nature of the situation. This creates an ironic contrast between the hunter and the hunted. The image portrays a moment where the pursuer is oblivious to being similarly captured or confined within a larger context.
